title: OnionSentinel - Dark Web Monitoring & Discovery Input
description: Monitor .onion sites for threats or discover new targets using dark web search engines.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Choose between 'monitoring' (scan specific targets), 'discovery' (find new .onion sites) or 'uptime-check' (verify link availability).

query.title: Discovery Query
query.sectionDescription: Settings for finding new .onion sites using dark web search engines.

targets.title: Monitoring Targets
targets.description: List of .onion URLs to monitor (Monitoring mode only). Max 10 URLs.
targets.sectionDescription: Define which dark web sites to monitor and what to look for.

keywords.title: Keywords & Queries
keywords.description: List of keywords to look for (Monitoring mode only).

region.title: Browser Region
region.description: Select the geographic region for the Owl Browser instance.

maxPagesPerTarget.title: Max Pages per Target
maxPagesPerTarget.description: Limit the number of sub-pages crawled per root URL.

saveScreenshots.title: Save Evidence Screenshots
saveScreenshots.description: Capture screenshots where keywords are found.

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of targets to process in parallel.
